comment._content: Frank Moss (c1860-1920) of New York City, assistant district attorney, and president of the Board of Police Commissioners: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frank_Moss_(lawyer)

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Involved in the prosecution of the Rosenthal murder case. Many of the 1913 Bain photos on LOC are connected to that case.
